<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/94255df057afa0b7dde77612f3274d4440871bd1|patch 8.2.0211: test for ANSI colors fails without an "ls" command>
patch 8.2.0211: test for ANSI colors fails without an "ls" command

Problem:    Test for ANSI colors fails without an "ls" command.
Solution:   Use "dir". (Ken Takata, closes #5582)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0211: test for ANSI colors fails without an "ls" command · vim/vim@94255df
attachments.text: Problem: Test for ANSI colors fails without an "ls" command. Solution: Use "dir". (Ken Takata, closes #5582)

            closes #5579)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7077892a7918845a00ce8d7833b43cc6cbed2081|patch 8.2.0213: configure does not recognize gcc 10.0 and later>
patch 8.2.0213: configure does not recognize gcc 10.0 and later

Problem:    Configure does not recognize gcc 10.0 and later.
Solution:   Adjust the pattern matching the version number. (Sergei
            Trofimovich, closes #5580)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0213: configure does not recognize gcc 10.0 and later · vim/vim@7077892
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0213: configure does not recognize gcc 10.0 and later · vim/vim@7077892
attachments.text: Problem: Configure does not recognize gcc 10.0 and later. Solution: Adjust the pattern matching the version number. (Sergei Trofimovich, closes #5580)

patch 8.2.0214: a popup window with a terminal can be made hidden

Problem:    A popup window with a terminal can be made hidden.
Solution:   Disallow hiding a terminal popup.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0214: a popup window with a terminal can be made hidden · vim/vim@2e6638d
attachments.text: Problem: A popup window with a terminal can be made hidden. Solution: Disallow hiding a terminal popup.

patch 8.2.0215: wrong file name shortening

            closes #5583, closes #5584)
